name: Penguin Feaver
description:
you are a little penguin trying to go into the party, wen you reach at the party it is extremely boring so you have an idea to get some itens to make the party great with a random generated levelcontrols

Jump: W Key , A Buttom

Move: A and D , LStick

the game was made in a game jam and the Theme was The fire Musin't go out or Penguin party. i chose both the fire musin't go out is the Happynes of the party musin's go out and the penguin party is the penguin party very simple. the game has a random generated level so every play is diferent in each level, every time you get a iten like a music box you need to come back some block disapear and other reapear so the backtravel is diferent too
